welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Simon Bolivar, the charming city known for its breathtaking scenery, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport serves flights within Ecuador.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
